outline:
1. remote, far, distant, distant lands, distant ones
    1. of distance, time
  2. distance
    1. from a distance (with prep)
kjv_def: (a-) far (abroad, off), long ago, of old, space, great while to come.
strongs_def: remote, literally or figuratively, of place or time; specifically, precious; often used adverbially (with preposition)
